Name: Unión
Ingredients: 60 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
History: Mexico Bacardí Legacy 2017 winning cocktail created by Jorge Landeros at Fifty Mils in Mexico City, Mexico.
Nutrition: One serving of Unión contains 265 calories
Garnish: Sugarcane leaves & citrus salt rim (dehydrated peel of 3 lemons and 2 oranges, ground with 100g salt and 30g icing sugar)
